== Kamstrups hardy Theme Brain Storm ==

This page contains a brain storm and Murrine hack-fest results from MikkelKamstrupErlandsen.

=== Theme Hacking Tricks ===
There are a few handy tricks to get going on GTK+ theme engine hacking. They are stored on my <nowiki>[[MikkelKamstrupErlandsen/ThemeEngineTricks| ThemeEngineTricks]]</nowiki> page.
